name: Horicent Systems
description:
Horicent Systems is a rapidly growing consulting and outsourcing company. We emphasizes clear goals, planned execution, client involvement. Our consultants possess considerable expertise in a wide range of technologies to provide enhanced service.
Established in 2012, our team has vast industry expertise in Salesforce, Java, ASP.NET, C#, PHP, Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal and other cloud computing technologies.
With a team of top rated AppExchange developers and salesforce certified professionals, ready to work round the clock and think out of the box, Horicent Systems stands one step ahead to provide prompt and precise service to its clients.
Services we provide: 1) Salesforce consulting and support; 2) Customer Relationship Management; 3) App Exchange Product Development / Support; 4) Web Development and Integration; and 5) Mobile Applications Development - Android/ IPhone.
